item.title: About Life and Ethics
item.description:
The Meditations of Marcus Aurelius really brought me into the stoic philosophy. After the initial part life and death below I’ll continue with quotes regarding life and ethics. The next and final post about the book will be about life and emotions.

As a Roman emperor and Stoic, Marcus Aurelius is known for his thoughts and life wisdom, which still inspire many people today. His reflections on life, death, and human nature are definetely timeless.

item.title: About Life and Death
item.description:
While reading the Meditations of Marcus Aurelius, I saved some passages using Readwise* that I would like to add. I have grouped the quotes according to the topic. You are reading about life and death and there is life and emotions and life and ethics, too.

As a Roman emperor and Stoic, Marcus Aurelius is known for his thoughts and life wisdom, which still inspire many people today. His reflections on life, death, and human nature are definetely timeless.
